sentence.Network_en: The operetta become more and more popular.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 轻歌剧（operetta）——又称小歌剧，盛行于十九世纪的法国，常常有对白， 音乐风格轻快幽默，有时又比较抒情。
舞台英文术语 ... trade show 贸易展 operetta 小歌剧 monodrama 独脚戏.
来自台湾：英语《词根大法（展示版）》 - 豆丁网 ... omelet 煎蛋卷 operetta 小型轻松歌剧 packet 小包.

list.abs: 戈达尔称之为首部“左派歌舞剧”（socialist operetta），其实情节上浪漫成分大过社会意义，值得褒奖的是初出茅庐的鲍勃.福斯摄影机运动与舞蹈空间的灵活运用，尤.
She collaborated with Mr. Smith to produce operettas ., 她与史密斯先生合作创作小歌剧.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Italian, diminutive of opera (see opera)

entry.def: An operetta is a light-hearted opera which has some of the words spoken rather than sung.

auth_sentence.content: His collection paid homage to the Naples of an operetta or a vintage postcard.

auth_sentence.content: A...bitter-sweet operetta, which fuses Scandinavian melancholia and introversion with Manhattan stringency, and cynicism.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: A...bitter-sweet operetta, which fuses Scandinavian melancholia and introversion with Manhattan stringency, and cynicism.

auth_sentence.content: Sawer's last high-profile stage work was Skin Deep, an operetta about plastic surgery.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sawer's last high-profile stage work was Skin Deep, an operetta about plastic surgery.

stems_affixes.word_buile: oper工作+able能……的→能工作[操作,手术]的
operation操作+al……的→adj.操作的, 运作的
co共同+operation操作→共同操作→合作
oper工作+a→通过工作[创作]而来

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运转,开动,操作,手术,运算,经营
stems_affixes.word_buile: operate[v.操作,运转,开动,起作用,动手术]+ion表名词→n.运转,开动,操作,手术,运算,经营

stems_affixes.value_cn: 操作,运转,开动,起作用,动手术
